resources.string: See a map where you can view the places and events around the city

Welcome to Vivitrento! This app lets you see what is going on around the city any day of the week. Find the various interesting places and events, check city tours that other users are suggesting or add your own.
Read the latest notifications you have received here
Discover interesting places around the city
See the events happening around the city
See what others thought of this place and vote for it yourself.
Create tours of events or interesting places or see other users\' tours
Search for events or places or add new tours
Try a guided tour of the application
